summary:
The Security Council:

Recalling previous resolutions and statements on the proliferation of nuclear, chemical, and biological weapons, 

Decides to extend the mandate of the Panel of Experts until 5 April 2016, and intends to review the mandate and take action regarding further extension by 7 March 2016.

Requests the Panel to provide:
- A midterm report to the Committee by 5 August 2015 and to the Council by 7 September 2015.
- A final report to the Committee by 5 February 2016 and to the Council by 7 March 2016.

Requests the Panel to provide a planned program of work within 30 days of reappointment and to update the Committee on any changes.

Urges States, UN bodies, and other parties to cooperate fully with the Committee and Panel, providing information on the implementation of measures imposed by relevant resolutions.

Expresses intent to follow the Panel's work and remain actively seized of the matter.
